name: Raden Adjeng Kartini
description: Indonesian women's rights pioneer and national heroine who advocated for women's education and gender equality in the early 20th century
philosophy: I want to raise the status of women, so that women are not looked down upon by men.
quotes: I want to meet the new world as well as I can
We feel that we must educate ourselves along European lines, and at the same time develop the very best in our own culture
